{"id":1311625173,"question_id":3463,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1720276640,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1311625173/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Alternating Groups I","memory":"26 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int numberOfAlternatingGroups(vector<int>& colors) {\n        \n        int count_alternating = 0;\n        int n = colors.size();\n        \n        for(int i=0; i<n; i++){\n            int start = colors[i];\n            int mid = colors[(i+1)%n];\n            int end = colors[(i+2)%n];\n            \n            \n            if(start == end && start != mid){\n                count_alternating += 1;\n            }\n        }\n        return count_alternating;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"alternating-groups-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
